testsuite.name: AppTestsWithMySql: These tests will fail if SUT runs in PostgreSql mode.

testcase.name: Should make failed credit order; expecting 1 new row in 'credit_request_entity' with status='DECLINED' and 1 new row in 'order_entity' linked by a foreign key. This test will fail if SUT runs in PostgreSql mode.

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: New record should be added to order_entity table ==> expected: <1> but was: <0>

testcase.name: Should make failed buy order; expecting 1 new row in 'payment_entity' with status='DECLINED' and 1 new row in 'order_entity' linked by a foreign key. This test will fail if SUT runs in PostgreSql mode.

failure.message: org.opentest4j.AssertionFailedError: New record should be added to order_entity table ==> expected: <1> but was: <0>
